title: sync gets stuck at the end after large copy
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

I'm running a sync - usually between two remotes - and sometimes the sync does a lot of copying, and maybe some deleting and then gets stuck at the end doing nothing with (seemingly) no network traffic. At least the traffic monitoring is showing low-Kilobytes, whereas in the earlier stages it was in the 100s of KB/s or at times MB/s.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
charles@laputa ~> rclone version
rclone v1.54.0-beta.4811.e3a5bb9b4
- os/arch: darwin/amd64
- go version: go1.15.2
```

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

macOS 10.14.6

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

Jottacloud, and Hubic.

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

Example:

```rclone -v sync --checkers 15 --transfers 15 hubic-crypt:archives/2019-02/home/ --exclude expect/** --exclude charles/projects/icons/backup/icons.db --exclude charles/music/** jottacloud-crypt:archives/2019-02/home/```

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (eg output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

I don't have logs with -vv I'm afraid, but I've got some with -v.

```
rclone -v sync --checkers 15 --transfers 15 hubic-crypt:archives/2019-02/home/ --exclude expect/** --exclude charles/projects/icons/backup/icons.db --exclude charles/music/** jottacloud-crypt:archives/2019-02/home/

Transferred:   	         0 / 0 Bytes, -, 0 Bytes/s, ETA -
Checks:              1355 / 1542, 88%
Elapsed time:       1m9.7s

 *      charles/ansible.gerph.old/.git/logs/HEAD: checking

 * charles/Reference/ARM/…/DDI0151C_920T_TRM.pdf: checking

... spin on for a bit ...

Transferred:   	         0 / 0 Bytes, -, 0 Bytes/s, ETA -
Checks:            177742 / 177757, 100%
Deleted:             9659
Elapsed time:    1h32m9.7s
Checking:
 * charles/Reference/book…'s Word Puzzle (J).nes: checking
 * charles/.cpanm/work/15…3/devel/grep-pod-gt.pl: checking

2020/10/13 01:29:44 INFO  : charles/riscos/Export/Lib/CLX/h/disass: Deleted
2020/10/13 01:29:44 INFO  : charles/projects/justin/Sources/Applications/Clippy/VersionBas,ffb: Deleted
2020/10/13 01:29:44 INFO  : charles/projects/justin/Sources/Games/Doom/Utils/Slige/Resources/!MakeDiffs,fd7: Deleted

... skip many deletions ...

2020/10/13 01:31:43 INFO  : 
Transferred:   	         0 / 0 Bytes, -, 0 Bytes/s, ETA -
Checks:            179018 / 179018, 100%
Deleted:            10920
Elapsed time:    1h34m9.7s

... skip the next 12 hours of the same message ...

2020/10/13 13:46:42 INFO  : 
Transferred:   	         0 / 0 Bytes, -, 0 Bytes/s, ETA -
Checks:            179018 / 179018, 100%
Deleted:            10920
Elapsed time:   13h49m9.7s
```

It's still running, but it's not at all clear what it's doing.


Another example, using a slightly different directory:

```rclone -v sync --checkers 15 --transfers 15 hubic-crypt:archives/2019-03/home/ --exclude expect/** --exclude charles/projects/icons/backup/icons.db --exclude charles/music/** jottacloud-crypt:archives/2019-03/home/
2020/10/12 16:07:37 INFO  :
